meanings.definition: A name used by an author in place of their own name.
meanings.sent1: In the book, the author used an allonym to hide their true identity.
meanings.sent2: The allonym on the cover of the novel caught the reader's attention.
meanings.sent3: I chuckled when I saw the clever allonym the writer chose for themselves.
meanings.sent4: Her allonym was like a mask, concealing the true person behind the words.
meanings.sent5: The allonym added an air of mystery to the author's persona.

meanings.definition: A name used by a person in place of their own name.
meanings.sent1: The celebrity used an allonym to check into the hotel unnoticed.
meanings.sent2: His allonym became famous in its own right.
meanings.sent3: She giggled when her friend introduced himself with a silly allonym.
meanings.sent4: The allonym he chose was a shield against unwanted attention.
meanings.sent5: The allonym allowed him to step into a different persona.
